mapper.sql: sn, title, type1, bogi1, bogi2, bogi3, bogi4, bogi5, bogi1jum, bogi2jum, bogi3jum, bogi4jum, bogi5jum, svyno, odrno
mapper.select:
select
distinct
FROM surveypool
where svyno = #{svyno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by odrno
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

select sn,svname,svtype,svmemo ,codename svytypename,smcnt
FROM survey JOIN usercode uc ON uc.code = survey.svtype
left outer join ( SELECT svyno,COUNT(*) smcnt from surveypool GROUP BY svyno ) spsm on spsm.svyno = survey.sn
where 1=1
and svtype = #{svtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by ${orderByClause}
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
SELECT CODE svtype, codename svytypename FROM usercode WHERE CODE2 = '설문'
select sn,svname,svtype,svmemo from survey where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into surveypool ( svyno, odrno, title, type1, bogi1, bogi2, bogi3, bogi4, bogi5, bogi1jum, bogi2jum, bogi3jum, bogi4jum, bogi5jum)
values (

insert into survey ( svtype, svname, svmemo ) values ( #{svtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update surveypool
sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type1 = #{record.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi1 = #{record.bogi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi2 = #{record.bogi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi3 = #{record.bogi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi4 = #{record.bogi4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi5 = #{record.bogi5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi1jum = #{record.bogi1jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi2jum = #{record.bogi2jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi3jum = #{record.bogi3jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi4jum = #{record.bogi4jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi5jum = #{record.bogi5jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update surveypool set sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type1 = #{record.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi1 = #{record.bogi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi2 = #{record.bogi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi3 = #{record.bogi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi4 = #{record.bogi4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi5 = #{record.bogi5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bogi1jum = #{record.bogi1jum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bogi2jum = #{record.bogi2jum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bogi3jum = #{record.bogi3jum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bogi4jum = #{record.bogi4jum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bogi5jum = #{record.bogi5jum,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update surveypool
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type1 = #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi1 = #{bogi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi2 = #{bogi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi3 = #{bogi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi4 = #{bogi4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi5 = #{bogi5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bogi1jum = #{bogi1jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi2jum = #{bogi2jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi3jum = #{bogi3jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi4jum = #{bogi4jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bogi5jum = #{bogi5jum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT sn,CONCAT(elsname, ' ' , hak,'학년 일정 : ' , dday,' ',stime,' ~ ' , etime, ' ', ifnull(utjobcode,'') ,' 직업/ 강사 : ' ,tutorname) svmemo FROM vwselctusdtl WHERE CONCAT(elsname, ' ' , hak,'학년 일정 : ' , dday,' ',stime,' ~ ' , etime, ' ', ifnull(utjobcode,'') ,' 직업/ 강사 : ' ,tutorname) IS NOT null
SELECT ctudsn FROM contactusdetailsurvey WHERE svyno = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
